purpose: The email announces a recruitment opportunity for an Associate Professor position at TU Braunschweig in Germany, specifically in the area of Software Engineering for Safety Critical Systems. It highlights the qualifications sought in candidates, particularly in system design and analysis for safety and security requirements, and lists relevant research topics. The sender encourages recipients to share the opportunity with interested colleagues.
evidence_sentences: TU Braunschweig in Germany is recruiting an Associate Professor (tenured, W2)
We are seeking a candidate with a promising track record in the area of system design and analysis for safety and security requirements.
The following research topics are particularly relevant.
If you have questions, do not hesitate to ask me.
If you have colleagues who may be interested, please distribute the offer.
